Algeria History and Civilization ( Al jazair tarikh oua hatharat) is a historical animated series from Algeria that tells the history of Algeria in 52 episodes, with an average of 26 minutes per episode.  It aims to educate Algerian youth on selected aspects of their country's history before its independence from France in 1962.
